properties.name: geonetwork.security.passwordSalt
properties.description: The value used as salt for encoding the user passwords. A salt is a random piece of data added to a password before it's hashed. It should be unique for each GN instance but the same than other sharing the same database.

properties.name: geonetwork.security.provider
properties.description: The authentication provider, for example database, oauth, ldap. Not used for now.
